title: Start
body:
Scarlet Vice
by Eliseu Dantas
Ludum Dare 40

Mission Log:
I'm Agnes, from the human tribe of the south. 
The first part of the mission was a success. I have with me the connection maps. 
Now, I need to take the information to a secure place. 
My veiche was destroided and I don't have a way to contact the base, I also have to ..
Whait... 
There is something here...
